remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 、 和 的基底類別。 is the base class for , , and . 使用中新的 Windows Form 應用程式建立工具列包含 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自訂外觀和行為都可以透過或佈景主題，而不支援溢位和執行階段項目及其相關類別重新排列。Use and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering. 控制項也提供豐富的設計階段經驗，包括在就地啟用和編輯、 自訂配置和共用的水平或垂直空間內指定。 controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified . 類別會提供許多可管理繪製、 滑鼠和鍵盤輸入，以及拖放功能的成員。The class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality. 使用類別類別，以取得更多的控制和自訂的所有繪製和版面配置樣式Windows Form 上的控制項。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all controls on a Windows Form. 下列項目專為緊密地與這兩個和中所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 它們是在設計階段的預設可用的控制項：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - - - - 您可以加入控制項內指定和合併彼此的控制項。You can join controls within a specified and merge controls with each other. 使用而不是多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。Use rather than for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 一般而言，無法享有定位順序中，除非絕對定位而停駐或。Typically, a does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a . 使用類別，以裝載中的任何其他 Windows Form 控制項。Use the class to host any other Windows Forms control in a . 根據預設，為雙重緩衝，利用設定。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將和至 Windows Form 中，加入項目至，並加入至的。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`並設定屬性`false`拖放行為，您已定義在回應， ，和事件。Set the property to `true` and set the property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the , , and events. 設定至`false`並設定至`true`造成類別處理拖放和項目的自動重新排列。Set to `false` and set to `true` to cause the class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically. 設定至`true`兩個允許拖曳的項目從某個物件之間。Set to `true` for two objects to allow dragging of items from one to the other. 若要啟用預設拖放，必須在拖曳作業期間按下 ALT 鍵。To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation. 設定同時和至`true`擲回例外狀況。Setting both and to `true` throws an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保，錨定的邊緣仍保留在相同位置相對於邊緣父控制項的父控制項調整大小。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定至`false`和嵌入 面板的界限移動時，不會轉譯到不同的面板。If you set to `false` and the is embedded in a panel, the bounds of the are not translated when you move the to a different panel of the . 若要正確地解譯界限，同步處理事件，檢查的值屬性，並調整大小。To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the event, check the value of the property, and resize the . ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only property. 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`和是，都沒有映像，也不調整，就會發生。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定至導致其父控制項的左邊緣對齊本身，並會隨著調整父控制項調整大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 沿著表單上控制項的視覺化圖層。Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth). 控制項可以停駐於父容器的某一邊或可停駐的邊緣和填滿的父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 如果控制項處於、可以內重新定位和透過s。If the control is in a , the can be repositioned within the and across s. 屬性會被忽略，而且如果屬性是`false`，大小為中加入項目會隨著。The property is ignored, and if the property is `false`, the size of the grows as items are added to the . 一般而言，不會參與的索引標籤順序。Typically, the does not participate in the tab order. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only property. 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`和是，都沒有映像，也不調整，就會發生。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制映像的預設大小。Use the property to control the default size of an image. 使用影像的大小，使自動調整來容納同時保留原始的映像比例。Use to make the size of the image on a to automatically adjust to fit on a while retaining the original image proportions. ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各個層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only property. 影像縮放比例取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有影像的縮放比例就會發生，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`和是，都沒有映像，也不調整，就會發生。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理對話方塊字元，例如 TAB、 RETURN、 逸出，和方向鍵前置處理的訊息呼叫方法。The method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只傳送至父控制項的字元方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The simply sends the character to the parent control's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式或 ActiveX 控制項中裝載控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，可讓控制項處理助憶鍵字元。The method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 這個方法應該決定控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，以及指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`，指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 當`directed`參數設定為`true`、`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 當`forward`設為`true`，定位順序中的下一個控制項已選取; 當`false`，選取先前的控制項定位順序中。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法啟動控制項，如果控制項的樣式位元會設為`true`、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。The method activates the control if the control's style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後被篩透過方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱`WindowProc`函式在 Windows 平台 SDK 參考的文件位於 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息是在此範例中了解當另一個應用程式無法成為使用中處理。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 如需有關可用資訊， ，和值，請參閱位於 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For information about the available , , and values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 實際的常數值可以找到也會提供在 MSDN 上 Platform SDK （Core SDK > 一節） 下載中所包含的 windows.h 標頭檔中。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 繼承的控制項，應該呼叫基底類別的方法來處理未處理任何訊息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
